bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a dian xian 癲癇 , peak-illness with epilepsy, which breaks out all of a sudden. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry lu feng fang 露蜂房 quotes Yang shi chan ru ji yan fang 楊氏產乳集驗方 : 卒癇。蜂房大者一枚， 水三升，煮令濃赤，以浴小兒 , “For sudden epilepsy : boil one large homeycomb cell in three sheng of water until a thick, red liquid has formed. This is used to bathe the child”.
